title: Suppressing ERp57 diminishes osteoclast activity and ameliorates ovariectomy-induced bone loss via the intervention in calcium oscillation and the calmodulin/calcineurin/Nfatc1 pathway
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Tao Yuan, Yi Wang, Haojue Wang, Qizhen Lu, Xin Zhang, Ziqing Li, Shui Sun
